SKT_FIRST.name: Shield Rush
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>buff(s)</color> from the target.
description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000001_1_1]</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000001_1_1]</color> <color=#28d9ed>buff(s)</color> from the target.

SKT_SECOND.name: Sliding Uppercut
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Taunted</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Changes to Enhanced Attack\nActivates Dual Attack with 1 ally

description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000001_2_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Taunted</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000001_2_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Raging Storm
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict Reduced <color=#28d9ed>Accuracy</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000001_3_1]</color> chance to inflict Reduced <color=#28d9ed>Accuracy</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000001_3_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, reduces all allies' skill cooldowns by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>buff(s)</color> from the target.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, reduces all allies' skill cooldowns by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000001_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000001_backup_1_1]</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000001_backup_1_1]</color> <color=#28d9ed>buff(s)</color> from the target.
